info.name: GPlayAPIUnitTests
info.description: Unit tests for GPlayAPI specific enhancements.

item.name: App Reviews - Privacy by Default

exec: pm.test("The 'data' array is present and contains at least one element", function () {
pm.test("Reviews does not contains the 'userName', 'userImage', 'replyText'  attributes", function () {

query.description: Optional - Number of reviews; defaults to 100; Max - 5000 for performance reasons

Broken since design change. 
sort.NEWEST, sort.RATING and sort.HELPFULNESS. defaults to sort.NEWEST
Optional - The two letter country code in which to fetch the reviews; defaults to 'us'
Optional - The two letter language code in which to fetch the reviews; defaults to 'en'
Optional - Defines if the result will be paginated - defaults to false
Optional - The next token to paginate; defaults to null
Optional - To include reply data in response.
Defaults to false - excludes userName, userImage and any instance of userName in replyText

request.description: Get Reviews of a given app
